biotools.summary: Allele-Specific DNA Methylation Databases (ASMdb) is a comprehensive database for allele-specific DNA methylation in diverse organisms. ASMdb is aiming to provide a comprehensive resource and a web tool for showing the DNA methylation level and differential DNA methylation in diverse organisms.

bioschemas.name: ASMdb
